review: After my accident, I called a couple of the "tv lawyers" claiming how much they care. After being demeaned by one and no response from the other, I found Mr. Heaton. From the first phone to the very end, I never felt dismissed. The biggest and most important trait, besides doing what he says he will do, is that he LISTENS. My case was small compared to many others who have suffered so much loss but he still understood how it impacted my life and what was important to me. Many thanks to Aaron and team...
